title: My Pixel, is not work at all!
content:
My phone start to getting hot, and then the phone restart like a 3 times, like my old Nexus, and they never start againg, i though the bug fixed when the Pixel come out, but still get it. 
I tried reset, tried put on charged for a long time, i tried put at the same time the buttons of volume down and lock to factory settings.
